setConfiguration

public void setConfiguration(java.util.Properties config)
Description copied from interface: Application
Set the configuration. The Configuration has to be set prior to starting the application. Reasonable defaults for missing configuration properties will be chosen otherwise.
This method is meant to serve as a primary point for providing configuration data. Any modules that the ReplicaOntology Application bundle relies on will be configured transparently when calling this method.
If you want to customize the configuration of your application you can override this method to set your own parameters but make sure you call this method and also to override getConfiguration().

Recognized configuration key/value pairs
KeyDescription
containerTypeThe type of the underlying ECF container instance
containerIDThe ID of the container
targetIDID of the target container

Specified by:
setConfiguration in interface Application

getConfiguration

public java.util.Properties getConfiguration()
Description copied from interface: Application
Returns the configuration.
If you want to customize the configuration of your application you can override this method to return your configuration parameters but make sure you also add the Properties supplied by this method to your configuration properties.
Have a look at the setConfiguration() documentation for a description of all configuration keys.

Specified by:
getConfiguration in interface Application
See Also:
Application.setConfiguration(java.util.Properties)

addOWLOntology

public void addOWLOntology(org.semanticweb.owlapi.model.OWLOntology ontology,
                           java.lang.String group,
                           Client.OnOntologyAddedListener listener)
                    throws Client.AddException
Description copied from interface: Client
Add the specified ontology to the pool of shared ontologies in group. If group is null, then the ontology will belong to no group. If group does not exist yet, it will be created.

Specified by:
addOWLOntology in interface Client
Throws:
Client.AddException

getOWLOntologyIDs

public void getOWLOntologyIDs(java.util.Set<java.lang.Object> groups,
                              Client.OnOntologyIDsReceivedListener listener)
                       throws Client.FetchException
Description copied from interface: Client
Returns IDs of all shared ontologies which belong to the specified groups.
If groups is null, IDs of all shared ontologies will be returned.
Beware that the specified set implementation has to be serializable.

Specified by:
getOWLOntologyIDs in interface Client
Throws:
Client.FetchException
